metadata.title: RA and FSP Curriculum: I-008 Introduction to Debugging for RA and FSP

sections.content:
This introductory curriculum course provides the basics needed to create and debug project for RA MCUs on FSP. 
I-008 Introduction to Debugging for RA for FSP 4.5.0- an overview presentation provides a quick introduction to Renesas MCUs, Kits and Tools. An overview of debugging is provided as an introduction to the hands-on lab that details key debugging techniques and flows for RA and FSP. The lab uses FSP 4.5.0 and the EK-RA6M4 kit.
  The course materials are available in a single zip file here.
  I-008 Introduction to Debugging for RA for FSP 4.3.0- an overview presentation provides a quick introduction to Renesas MCUs, Kits and Tools. An overview of debugging is provided as an introduction to the hands-on lab that details key debugging techniques and flows for RA and FSP. The lab uses FSP 4.3.0 and the EK-RA6M4 kit.
  The course materials are available in a single zip file here.
  I-008 Introduction to Debugging for RA for FSP 4.0.0- an overview presentation provides a quick introduction to Renesas MCUs, Kits and Tools. An overview of debugging is provided as an introduction to the hands-on lab that details key debugging techniques and flows for RA and FSP. The lab uses FSP 4.0.0 and the EK-RA6M4 kit.
  The course materials are available in a single zip file here.
  I-008 Introduction to Debugging for RA for FSP 4.3.0- an overview presentation provides a quick introduction to Renesas MCUs, Kits and Tools. An overview of debugging is provided as an introduction to the hands-on lab that details key debugging techniques and flows for RA and FSP. The lab uses FSP 4.3.0 and the EK-RA6M4 kit.
  The course materials are available in a single zip file here.
  All Introductory RA and FSP courses are listed here.
